snippet: Rodolfo Zelaya scored off a saved penalty kick in the second half, and El Salvador edged Haiti to advance in the Concacaf Gold Cup in Houston.
abstract: El Salvador defeats Haiti, 1-0, in soccer's Concacaf Gold Cup; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rodolfo Zelaya scored off a saved penalty kick in the second half, and El Salvador edged Haiti to advance in the Concacaf Gold Cup in Houston.

headline.main: El Salvador Advances After Escaping Haiti in Gold Cup
